mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO AS MEMBERNO, MEMBER_ID AS MEMBERID, MEMBER_PWD AS MEMBERPWD, AUTH_PROVIDER AS AUTHPROVIDER, MEMBER_NICKNAME AS MEMBERNICKNAME, MEMBER_GENDER AS MEMBERGENDER, BIRTHDATE AS BIRTHDATE, EMAIL AS EMAIL, ADDRESS AS ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS AS DETAILADDRESS, ENROLL_DATE AS ENROLLDATE, MEMBER_STATUS AS MEMBER_STATUS, DOG_YN AS DOGYN FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND MEMBER_PWD=#{memberPwd}
